abstract: The company is introducing a free service, intended for marketers, but which will allow anyone to track the popularity of various terms in Google’s search engine.
snippet: The company is introducing a free service, intended for marketers, but which will allow anyone to track the popularity of various terms in Google’s search engine.
lead_paragraph: GOOGLE is giving everyone a chance to peek deeper into its database of search requests and discover the things that preoccupy individuals and, in aggregate, entire cities, states or nations, at any one time.

headline.main: Google’s New Tool Is Meant for Marketers
headline.print_headline: Google’s New Tool Is Meant for Marketers

abstract: YouTube clips embedded in blogs now can be covered with ads, creating a look that is far more clustered than the clean aesthetic that Google usually aspires to.
snippet: YouTube clips embedded in blogs now can be covered with ads, creating a look that is far more clustered than the clean aesthetic that Google usually aspires to.
lead_paragraph: Take a look at the image here and you see proof of what we all knew: Google is not going to put its highfalutin ideals above the practical realities of its business.

headline.main: Google Goes Gaudy With YouTube Ads

abstract: Google said Wednesday that it had found a buyer for its Performics search-marketing unit: Publicis Groupe, the giant French advertising holding company.
snippet: Google said Wednesday that it had found a buyer for its Performics search-marketing unit: Publicis Groupe, the giant French advertising holding company.
lead_paragraph: Google said Wednesday that it had found a willing buyer for its Performics search-marketing unit: Publicis Groupe, the giant French advertising holding company.

headline.main: Google Offloads Search-Marketing Business to Publicis
